Description: Zluri lets you discover and manage Slack Enterprise users, workspaces, and channels. You can track user activity, access logs, and billing plans while ensuring compliance with information barriers and audit logs. Zluri enables seamless user management by automating onboarding, offboarding, and role-based access assignments. With Zluri, you can create and manage public and private channels, send direct messages and group messages, and automate notifications and alerts to users or channels. Additionally, you can monitor app requests, view shared files, track emoji reactions, and gain insights into Slack usage across your organization, optimizing costs and security.

Submodules.Integration: Connecting Slack Enterprise to Zluri is quick and painless. Check out ourstep-by-step instructions.

Description: With direct integration with Snyk, organizations can track which users access Snyk, monitor usage trends, and conduct periodic access audits to maintain security and compliance. Employees can be automatically assigned to Snyk organizations or groups based on defined attributes such as department, role, or employment status, ensuring proper access management across development and security teams.
